ygData.msgSnippet: Last I heard, they were working on implementing something like this. No ETA of course. Elwyn 50 Bard Tarukin 31 Monk Erollisi Marr ... From: Peck White
ygData.messageBody:
Last I heard, they were working on implementing something like this.
No ETA of course.


Elwyn 50 Bard
Tarukin 31 Monk
Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Peck White [mailto:peck_white@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2000 8:26 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Ok I need advice...


From: Peck White <peck_white@...>

There was a thread I read earlier but I'm not sure it
was on this list. The jist of the thread was, to
prevent disputes about loot, when a corpse is looted
you would see the following:

PlayerX loots MobY's corpse
PlayerX sees a Black Pearl
PlayerX sees a Fine Steel Long Sword
PlayerX recieves 3pp 2gp 8sp 2cp

This doesn't seem like it would be too hard to code
and would eliminate any dispute, assuming the person
doing the questioning was present at the time of the
looting.

Tomerrilin
Mith Marr
